default.prompt: Speak in a clear, neutral narrative voice.

character_voices.prompt: Speak as a young, curious woman with enthusiasm and wonder. Use a slightly higher pitch and animated delivery.
Speak as a mature, thoughtful man with a deep, calm voice. Use measured pacing and authoritative tone.
Speak as an omniscient storyteller with a warm, engaging voice. Use clear diction and appropriate dramatic pauses.
Speak as a young child with innocence and excitement. Use a higher pitch and playful delivery.
Speak with a menacing, calculating tone. Use a lower register and deliberate pacing to convey threat.
